quest.name: Original Sins
journal: Sidurgu recognizes that desperate times call for desperate measures.

Sidurgu believes that if Rielle holds some affinity with the dragons, then the only way to be certain is to present her to a Dravanian. He believes this to be a nigh-impossible task─until you reveal that you have already parleyed with Vidofnir, that is. Journey to Anyx Trine and entreat the dragon for her aid.
Vidofnir studies your companions, her gaze lingering on Rielle a moment longer. She then asks that you bring an offering of gron ahlm as a gesture of goodwill. Discuss her request with Sidurgu.
Though puzzled by the request, Sidurgu accepts that it must be done. He and Rielle will search the lands to the north for the flowers, while you will search the south.
As Vidofnir warned, your attempt to harvest gron ahlm was not without incident. In any case, the flowers are now yours. Return to the dragon and see if your offering is sufficient.
Vidofnir tells you of a dragon on the verge of death in Mourn, who has the answers you seek. Present the flowers to the Dravanian and hearken to her words.

Through labored breaths, the dragon declares that the blood of her beloved flows strong in Rielle's veins. Furthermore, the fact that the girl has not succumbed to the blood suggests that it was passed on to her by her parents. Forced to accept the truth at last, Sidurgu despairs that the Temple Knights will never cease their pursuit of Rielle. He bemoans his inability to harness the abyss his master spoke of, which piques the dying dragon's curiosity. After learning the nature of your dark arts, the dragon chides you for your foolishness, stating that even the tiny beings who frolic in the mists of Sohm Al know a better way. Sidurgu presses her for details, but the dragon's energy is spent. No more answers will be had. Return to Ishgard and discuss what you have learned.

As you and Sidurgu weigh your options, a noblewoman strides into the Forgotten Knight and names you as the “knights” who would defy the will of Halone. Introducing herself as Ystride de Caulignont, she offers you a choice: trial by combat, or death for you and all who dare aid you. Seeing no alternative, Sidurgu grudgingly agrees. As Ystride turns to leave, Rielle at last cries out, revealing that she is Ystride's daughter. Incensed by her daughter's words, Ystride storms out of the tavern, and Sidurgu whirls about to confront Rielle. He demands to know why she never told him, shouting that he and Fray had a right to know─reminding her they bled for her, that Fray died for her. Shaken, she struggles to explain, but Sidurgu has heard enough. Refusing to look at Rielle, he bids you leave them for now, that he might have time to think.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu upon reaching level 58.
objectives: Speak with Vidofnir in Anyx Trine.
Search for gron ahlm in Avalonia Fallen.
Present the gron ahlm to Vidofnir.
Present the gron ahlm to the dying dragon in Mourn.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Mourn in Passing.”

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: I've been thinking, Forename...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: The Padjal likened Rielle's spiritual presence to that of a Dravanian, hence why he suggested she had partaken of dragon blood.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Regardless of the cause, if she does hold some affinity with dragons, she will never be safe here in Ishgard.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: “If” being the operative word, of course. We need to know for certain...which means we must parley with a Dravanian.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: It will not be easy, I realize. The Dravanians are not wont to entertain outsiders, especially ones hailing from Ishgard...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: You...you have spoken with their leaders!?

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Beg pardon, I did not think you would so readily admit it. Well, well! Pray lead the way, Forename!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: I pray this Vidofnir can give us the answers we seek...

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: Ever since you joined us, we've visited so many new places.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: I'm sure Fray would've enjoyed it too...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: She is rather large, isn't she...

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: I've never seen a dragon up close before! They're so big!

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thou keepest curious company, mortal...

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: ...I see.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Though I trust in thy words, thy companions are unknown to me. A token, then, for them to declare their intent.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: I would have them gather up gron ahlm in Avalonia Fallen and bring it to me.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: But ware the beasts which are drawn by their fragrance...

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thou must prepare an offering of gron ahlm. Only then shall we speak of other things.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: So dragons like flowers...just like we do...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Right, then. Gathering flowers for a dragon. No point in questioning it.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle and I will search the lands north of here together. You can take the south.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Doubtless she has her reasons. I merely wish I was privy to them.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Such fragile, fleeting creations. Bring them close, mortal, that I might breathe deep of their essence.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: That which passeth into death liveth on in memory...

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: One prepareth now for the journey. Bid farewell to her in Mourn and find the answer thou seekest.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: If thou wouldst know the legacy of the child, then seek the ancient one in Mourn.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Let me linger a while longer, hunter. Soon my soul shall take wing...

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: I shall miss this.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: ...Vidofnir bade you come to me?

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: His scent...entwined... Ahhh, I see now...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: We seek no quarrel, O ancient one. Only answers.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: ...Come forward, child.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: There you are, my beloved... How...how long hath it been since we soared through the mists...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Wh-What did you say!?

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Silence, dark one.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: He liveth on in you, child. The blood of my beloved floweth strong in thy veins.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Yet...mingled as it is... 'Twas not thee who partook of his essence...

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Were it not so, thou wouldst have been overcome...

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Thy progenitors...drank deep...to spur their own becoming...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Then...then it's true...and the Temple Knights knew!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Then they will never stop─they cannot! Even if we flee Ishgard...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: If...if we could but harness the abyss...

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Thou speakest strange, dark one. What dost thou seek?

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Ho... Shrouded in thy rancor, thou standest apart from thy charge.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: The folly of youth. Even the tiny beings who frolic in the mists of Sohm Al know a better way.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: What!? Who?

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: No more, dark one. No more.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Farewell, child. Fly free...for us...

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: Good-bye...and thank you.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: There's naught more for us here. To Ishgard.

dialogue.name: DRAGON02062
dialogue.text: Leave me to slumber, dark one. My beloved singeth to me.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: ...I see now.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...This changes nothing.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: I swore an oath to protect her, and I mean to uphold it─no matter the cost.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: (-???-)So these are the “knights” who would defy the will of Halone.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: She...she's found us!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: My lady surely knows she will find few friends here.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: (-???-)Blessed are we who abide in Her grace, for we shall never be forsaken.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: One day I, Ystride de Caulignont, shall walk in Her halls...and you shall answer for your deeds.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Will you stand before Her and claim that you were righteous? That it was just to take so many lives in defense of that abomination!?

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Repent of your sins and surrender it to me. The Fury may yet spare your souls.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: So yours is the righteous cause?

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: To condemn a girl to death for her parents' deeds─this is the will of Halone?

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: ...Yes. Yes, it is.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: If you will not see reason, even with full knowledge of the facts, then I make to you all a final offer: submit to a trial by combat.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Survive, and you may go in peace. Fall, and it is mine.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Refuse, and I will put this tavern to the torch and have the heads of every man, woman, and child here.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Anyone who dares harbor you will suffer the same, here or elsewhere. This I swear to you.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Would that we could settle this here and now...but I'd wager your men at the doors would take offense.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: As you wish, my lady. You shall have your trial.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: I shall send a messenger with details.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: M-Mother, wait!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: ...I should've had them cut out your tongue.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle, what in the seven hells is going on!?

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: She...she told them to take me. She said I wasn't hers...that I was...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Why didn't you tell me this was all your mother's doing!?

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: I bled for you! Fray died for you! We had a right to know!

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: I...I didn't mean for...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Godsdammit all!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...Leave us, Forename. I need time to think.
